definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: appropriate, suitable? (cf. NH Aram., supr.)—[[הַגְּדֶרֶת הֲגִינׇה]] Ez Eze 42:12 the corresponding (?) wall, Ke; otherwise Vrss (LXX kala/mou, Vulgate separatum, etc.); Thes connects [[הגין]] with preceding [[דֶּרֶח]], ‘aptus, idoneus (de via),’ AV RV ‘the way directly before the wall;’ in neither connexion does it give good sense, and the text is doubtless wrong cf. Sm Da.; Co conj. [[החחר החיחונה]] the outer court.
